pr_title: [FLINK-18299][json] Add option in json format to parse timestamp in different format standard

timeline.bodyText: You can make the timestampFormat as optional to avoid invoke it for every TestSpec.
timeline.author: wuchong
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -383,73 +407,117 @@ private void testParseErrors(TestSpec spec) throws Exception {
 		TestSpec
 			.json("{\"id\": \"trueA\"}")
 			.rowType(ROW(FIELD("id", BOOLEAN())))
+			.timestampFormat("ISO-8601")

replies.bodyText: Thanks Jark's help. I have already fixed this.
replies.author: fsk119

timeline.author: wuchong
wuchong

timeline.bodyText: Put this exception in the default branch of swith.
timeline.author: wuchong
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -38,4 +44,40 @@
 			.defaultValue(false)
 			.withDescription("Optional flag to skip fields and rows with parse errors instead of failing;\n"
 					+ "fields are set to null in case of errors, false by default");
+
+	public static final ConfigOption<String> TIMESTAMP_FORMAT = ConfigOptions
+			.key("timestamp-format.standard")
+			.stringType()
+			.defaultValue("SQL")
+			.withDescription("Optional flag to specify timestamp format, SQL by default." +
+				" Option ISO-8601 will parse input timestamp in \"yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.s{precision}\" format and output timestamp in the same format." +
+				" Option SQL will parse input timestamp in \"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.s{precision}\" format and output timestamp in the same format.");
+
+	// --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+	// Option enumerations
+	// --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+
+	public static final String SQL = "SQL";
+	public static final String ISO_8601 = "ISO-8601";
+
+	public static final Set<String> TIMESTAMP_FORMAT_ENUM = new HashSet<>(Arrays.asList(
+		SQL,
+		ISO_8601
+	));
+
+	// --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+	// Utilities
+	// --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+
+	public static TimestampFormat getTimestampFormat(ReadableConfig config){
+		String timestampFormat = config.get(TIMESTAMP_FORMAT);
+		switch (timestampFormat){
+			case SQL:
+				return TimestampFormat.SQL;
+			case ISO_8601:
+				return TimestampFormat.ISO_8601;
+		}
+		throw new TableException(

timeline.bodyText:
Add the timestamp format option into getAllOptions.
options.put("canal-json.timestamp-format.standard", "ISO-8081");

timeline.bodyText:
Add the timestamp format option into getAllOptions.
options.put("debezium-json.timestamp-format.standard", "ISO-8081");
timeline.author: wuchong

timeline.bodyText: Add an additional test for lowercase iso-8081.
timeline.author: wuchong

timeline.message: add `timestamp-format` keyword for json format and add test for new feature.
